member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.PivotClient.MemberIconConverter
member.summary: Represents the converter to display the icons based on members.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.PivotClient.MemberIconConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Modifies the source data before passing it to the target for display in the UI.
member.param: The source data being passed to the target.
The type of the target property, as a type reference.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The language of the conversion.
member.returns: The data template to be passed to the target dependency property.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.PivotClient.MemberIconConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Modifies the target data before passing it to the source object. This method is called only in TwoWay bindings.
member.param: The target data being passed to the source.
The type of the target property, as a type reference.
An optional parameter to be used in the converter logic.
The language of the conversion.
